mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_QNA_CMT_SEQ, ROOM_QNA_SEQ, USER_ID, NVL(ROOM_QNA_CMT_CONTENT,'') ROOM_QNA_CMT_CONTENT, NVL(ROOM_QNA_CMT_STAT,'Y') ROOM_QNA_CMT_STAT, NVL(TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') CREATE_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') UPDATE_DT FROM ROOM_QNA_COMMENT WHERE ROOM_QNA_SEQ = #{value} ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_QNA_COMMENT ( ROOM_QNA_CMT_SEQ, ROOM_QNA_SEQ, USER_ID, ROOM_QNA_CMT_CONTENT, ROOM_QNA_CMT_STAT, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM_QNA_CMT_SEQ.nextval, #{roomQnaSeq}, #{userId}, #{roomQnaCmtContent}, #{rooQnaCmtStat}, SYSDATE, null)
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM_QNA_COMMENT SET ROOM_QNA_CMT_CONTENT = #{roomQnaCmtContent}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ROOM_QNA_CMT_SEQ = #{roomQnaCmtSeq}
